title: Alex Sherman on Potential Sprint, T-Mobile Merger (Audio)
itunes:title: Alex Sherman on Potential Sprint, T-Mobile Merger (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Cory Johnson and Dani Burger\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alex Sherman\u0010Reporter:Mergers & Acquisitions\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss Sprint resuming talks about a potential merger with T-Mobile, and will also give his outlook for Softbank/Charter Communications.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
